10: Angels From the Time of the Judges to the Early Kingdom

Christ as the “Angel of the Lord”
     When God sent His angels anciently to minister or communicate to individuals, when they learned that it was an angel they had seen and talked with, they were struck with awe, and were afraid that they should die. They had such exalted views of the terrible majesty and power of God, they thought to be brought into such close connection with one direct from His holy presence, would destroy them. . . . Judges 6:22, 23; 13:21, 22; Joshua 5:13-15.—4bSG 152.
